name: Resource Powder-Diabetic
description: Resource Diabetic is a nutritionally balanced diet for oral consumption or hyperglycemia. Resource Diabetic can be used as the sole source of nutrition or as a supplement. It can also be a part of a healthy meal plan for diabetics. Resource Diabetic is lactose free, gluten free, and meets international diabetic guidelines. Complete and balanced nutrition. Low glycemic index of 28. Rich in fibre (100% soluble). Contains 50% high quality whey protein. More than 60% of fat composition is Monounsaturated fatty acid which has valuable health benefits. Lactose, sucrose and fructose free. Vanilla flavour. Suitable for oral or tube feeding patients. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
